basic_description: Definition of JSON, purposes and uses of JSON, JSON data structure, syntax validation rules
structure_description: Objects, arrays, data types, syntax validation, creating valid JSON documents
parsing_description: Conversion between JavaScript objects and JSON, JSON.parse() and JSON.stringify() methods
tools_description: Working with JSON editors, JSON validators, JSON formatting tools
api_description: Using JSON for communication between client and server, creating and handling JSON in API
advanced_description: JSON Schema, JSON-LD (Linked Data), JSON Web Tokens (JWT)
